title: Mike D Gets His Pokémon Cards Evaluated by Dr. Lori + What’s the Haps: Bobby’s Weekend Getaway…and Eddie Blurts Out Something He Shouldn’t Have! + Is the Celeb Over or Under 50?
itunes:title: Mike D Gets His Pokémon Cards Evaluated by Dr. Lori + What’s the Haps: Bobby’s Weekend Getaway…and Eddie Blurts Out Something He Shouldn’t Have! + Is the Celeb Over or Under 50?
description:
Mike D gets his childhood collection of Pokémon cards evaluated by our favorite antiques expert, Dr. Lori.  We share stories from our weekend inside of “What the Haps” where Bobby gives us all the details about his weekend getaway. Eddie says something he shouldn’t have said during the segment. It blew Bobby’s mind that Jeremy Renner (aka Hawkeye) is 51! He has Amy guess whether the celebrity is over or under the age of 50.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
